wikipedia_page.main: Captain Robert Henry Dundas Bolton OBE (13 January 1893 – 30 October 1964) was an Indian Army and British Army officer, police officer and English first-class cricketer.

response: * Bertie Bolton (Robert Henry Dundas Bolton, 1893–1964), Indian Army and British Army officer, police officer and English cricketer
* Bertie Bolton (1893–1964), Indian Army and British Army officer, police officer and cricketer
